pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Client for 'Adobe Analytics' API 2.0 // Connect to the 'Adobe Analytics' API v2.0 https://github.com/AdobeDocs/analytics-2.0-apis which powers 'Analysis Workspace'. The package was developed with the analyst in mind, and it will continue to be developed with the guiding principles of iterative, repeatable, timely analysis.
